TopicTitle: !!oops- it would be nice if you send to Dev's/message

Articles.Content:
Hi guys

my pc  is strictly a games machine No office, games keeps crashing since mod( module manager-docking camera) or 1.2 upgrade oops message says crash report in folder20-12????? be nice if you could forward to Dev team/or words to that effect.  any one explain how to send files ext. to the team please.

Well, that's not a lot of information to go on, but this isn't the appropriate place to file a bug report. There is an official bug tracker but it is only for unmodded games. There is a good chance that your crashes are due to mods that the game developers are not responsible for, especially if you are running mods that haven't been updated yet for 1.2. Any out of date mods need to be removed until they can be made compatible.

My suggestion would be to post your report in the forum subsection for Technical Support, Modded Installs and include more information about your computer system, exactly which mods you have installed, what is happening in the game when it crashes, and a copy of your error and output logs to help narrow down the cause of your crashes.

I would also suggest running a copy of the game with no mods installed and see if the crashes keep happening. If it doesn't crash then start adding your mods in one by one until you can find out which might be causing the problem.

Edited October 16, 2016 by HvP
Moved to technical support. Hope you get it working, @capt: scarlet!

many thanks sorry for the wrong place Newbie.. I have deleted all saves cleared the 2 mods out of //game data and started from scratch been playing for 2 hrs now. NO crashes.. tomorrow I will install one at a time as you said...thanks

Brian
